there may be no profession that grants a
person a closer look into the experience
of death
than palliative care nursing
this caregiving approach aims to ease
the suffering of patients with terminal
illnesses
one palliative care nurse ronnie ware
who assisted patients through the last
12 weeks of life wrote in her book the
top 5 regrets of dying of the experience
that she gathered from her patients
in the face of mortality
the top five regrets were
i wish i let myself be happier i wish i
stayed in touch with my friends i wish i

i wish i hadn't worked so hard
and most commonly
i wish i had the courage to live a life

terror management theory proposes that
there's a connection between the
awareness of our own mortality and the

and force our world views onto others
if this theory were to be proven true it

take claire weinland for example a girl

claire miraculously emerged from the

a year later at the age of 14 claire
